text: Antonio Borrometi (27 May 1953 â€“ 19 January 2022) was an Italian politician. He was a member of the Chamber of Deputies between 1996 until 2001. He was born in Modica, Italy. Borrometi was a member of the Italian People's Party. Borrometi died in Bologna, Italy on 19 January 2022, at the age of 68.Diretta Tv per i funerali di Antonio Borrometi ==References== Category:1953 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from Sicily
